name: Peekers
description:
Peekers is a 2D top-down platform game where you have to simply survive throughout night. In order to survive you must flashlight the monster that was peeking in your carpet, beneath your bed, cabinet and other objects inside your room.

  • Concept and Design: winziee
  • Programmer: zycrus
  • Artist and Audio Programmer: washi

    Audio Source:

  • YDS Sound
  • Ell Aitch Official
